query:
SELECT 
  a.id,
  a.apiId,
  a.smshubActivationId,
  a.phoneNumber,
  a.status,
  api.name as api_name,
  api.url as api_url
FROM activations a
LEFT JOIN sms_apis api ON a.apiId = api.id
WHERE a.phoneNumber = '5531920033958'
ORDER BY a.id DESC
LIMIT 1;
